description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 9/29/2005

At the Big Bear cabin, Ridge informs Stephanie that Brooke is dating Dante. Stephanie says she would like to see Ridge once in awhile. Brooke and Nick, still at Big Bear, try to contain themselves, but they cannot stop thinking about each other. Brooke reminds Nick that she loves him for not betraying Bridget. However, Nick reveals that Brooke is all he has ever wanted. Stephanie seethes when she spies Nick and Brooke talking together from the cabin terrace. Later, back in Los Angeles, a livid Stephanie reveals to Brooke that she saw her with Nick. Gaby apologizes for slapping Taylor. Taylor snaps that Gaby’s marriage to Thomas will be exposed as a fraud. Bridget cooks dinner for Nick, but he wants to make love instead. Phoebe is caught stealing fifty dollars from Steffy.  Phoebe snaps that she wants to live with Stephanie.  While Ridge and Taylor talk, he finally agrees to see a marriage counselor.
